name: Sight (ArmoryBlender)
description:
The game

This game is in the alpha version and still in development!!

Once there was a large abandoned large mansion that was lived by a lonely, very rich senior. He died a while ago and since then this place is haunted.  Many people tried to break into the mansion to get the money but never got back home...You’re another one that wants to try his luck in the haunted mansion. Your job is to get 10 bags filled with money. High risk gets high rewarded I guess...

How to play

  • Movement=WASD
  • Sprint=Left Shift
  • Look=Mouse Movement
  • Pickup=E
